mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow (follower_id, following_id) VALUES (#{follower_id}, #{following_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE is_deleted = FALSE, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, avatar_url, true is_following FROM `user` WHERE id IN ( SELECT following_id FROM `follow` WHERE follower_id = #{follower_id} AND is_deleted = FALSE ) ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT #{pages},#{limit};

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar_url, CASE WHEN f2.follower_id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_following FROM `user` u JOIN `follow` f1 ON u.id = f1.follower_id AND f1.is_deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN `follow` f2 ON u.id = f2.following_id AND f2.follower_id = #{following_id} AND f2.is_deleted = FALSE WHERE f1.following_id = #{following_id} AND u.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY f1.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{pages}, #{limit};
